message.body: So I fell asleep around midnight and woke up at 5 something. I forced myself to go back to keep around 6 something and woke up a few minutes ago. Should I count that as having slept 10 hours or having slept 5 hours and then getting a 5-hour nap?
I consider that a full night's sleep. Congrats!
Summer, is officially over! What happened to the slightly cold Fall weather cause it freakin' feels like Winter outside! Good morning! Hahah :)
I know.... My house hasn't been this cold in a while...
I'm not looking forward to going outside in a few minutes. It looks nice outside but that's what it wants you to think!
lol. Yup. Errands?
No I slept over my friends apartment in Chinatown. It's nice waking up here, it's a nice view.
Oh nice! So many sleep overs lately ehh.
This one was more unplanned than the last one. I just got really sleepy and began to pass out on her couch.
I gotcha. Twitter.
Sorry. Twitter was for someone else. Lol
Hey, whatever happened to that job interview?
I figured hahah.
I'm waiting for them to get back to me to schedule it.
It's funny that you ask because I sent them an email just last night to ask them something and to thank them.
I wish I got a name though because I'm addressing whoever it is as HR.
That's fine. When they respond back, you'll have the name.
Hopefully.
I have to say, waking up this early feels good!
That feeling only lasts for a little while...

Hahahahah! Wow thanks for letting me know what is to come...well so far this morning has been pretty picturesque. My friend and I went to get breakfast at this cafe called Good Karma. We got bagels that has cream cheese, honey, and apple slices on it. I kind of cleaned out my car and I'm now in my jammies :) who knows, the rest of my day could go downhill from here.
Back in jammies?! That's no good, too comfortable.
